0.1.name: wordpress/gslideshow
0.1.description:
The gSlideShow widget adds a small slideshow to your blog using media RSS. Media RSS is available from many image gallery like flickr or gallery2. But initially is was designed for the multi-user gallery http://www.phtagr.org.

The widget uses the Google Feed API with the slideshow component. It inserts a javascript slideshow as widget to your blog.

The widget is based on FlickrRSS 4.0.
